Author: jazminonacloud
Text: He sounds toxic as fuck. I’m sorry, OP. any possibility of sitting him down twin to twin and having a talk? I understand that that is not always easy or even possible when it comes to sibling on sibling aggression, but he needs to understand how much of an impact his callousness is having on you.   If he truly doesn’t care then forget him, you can be out of there in two years and cease having a relationship with him until he gets his shit together.
